preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 180 g of Nickel (Ni) and place in a clean mixing container. 
 2. Add 120 g of Phosphorus (P) to the container with Ni. 
 3. Carefully mix the Ni and P powders using a spatula until homogeneously blended. 
 4. Gradually add 40 g of Scandium (Sc) while continuing to mix thoroughly. 
 5. Finally, incorporate 20 g of Terbium (Tb) into the mixture, ensuring even distribution.
